DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety AMG 334 Migraine Prevention
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , multi-center study follow open-label phase . Adults one-year history episodic migraine receive migraine prophylaxis medication randomize one three AMG 334 treatment group placebo treatment group .
